00067     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00068     const Real PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldBlendNeighbor::getShadow (const Real mX, const Real mZ,
00069                                                             const bool &positive)
00070     {
00071         if (mShadow)
00072         {
00073             unsigned int Pos = static_cast<unsigned int> ((mZ * mShadow->getWidth() + mX) * 3);//3 bytes (mImage is RGBA)
00074             if (mShadow->getSize () > Pos)
00075             {
00076                 if (positive)
00077                     return static_cast<Real> (mShadow->getData()[ Pos + 0]) / 255;
00078                 else
00079                     return static_cast<Real> (mShadow->getData()[ Pos + 1]) / 255;
00080             }
00081             else
00082             {
00083                 return 0.0f;
00084             }
00085         }
00086         else
00087         {
00088             return 0.0f;
00089         }
00090     }
00091     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00092     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldBlendNeighbor::_save()
00093     {
00094                 // Disabled for now
00095                 return;
00096         uchar *data = new uchar[ mXDimension * mZDimension * 2 ];   
00097 
00098         const double divider = 65535.0 / mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00099         
00100         unsigned int j = 0;
00101         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMaxArrayPos; i++)
00102         {             
00103             const ushort syn = ushort  (mHeightData[i] * divider);
00104             #if OGRE_ENDIAN == ENDIAN_BIG
00105                 data[j] = uchar ((syn >> 8) & 0xff);
00106                         data[j+ 1] = uchar (syn & 0xff);
00107             #else
00108                         data[j] = uchar (syn & 0xff);
00109                         data[j+ 1] = uchar ((syn >> 8) & 0xff);
00110             #endif
00111             j += 2;            
00112         }
00113 
00114         const String fname = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename + "." +
00115                                     StringConverter::toString(mPageZ) + "." +
00116                                                 StringConverter::toString(mPageX) + ".";
00117         const String extname = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;
00118 
00119 
00120         FileInfoListPtr finfo =  ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().findResourceFileInfo (
00121                 mParent->getOptions()->groupName, 
00122                 fname + extname);
00123         FileInfoList::iterator it = finfo->begin();
00124         if (it != finfo->end())
00125         {
00126             //FileInfo *inf = &(*it);
00127             char *olddir = ChangeToDir (const_cast< char * > (((it)->archive->getName()).c_str()));
00128             //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory()
00129             
00130             std::ofstream outfile;
00131             String FileNameRaw;
00132             
00133             DataStreamPtr image_chunk(new MemoryDataStream ((void*)data,
00134                         mXDimension * mZDimension * 2 * sizeof (uchar), 
00135                         true)); 
00136 
00137             outfile.open (const_cast< char * > ((fname + "modif." + extname).c_str()),
00138                             std::ios::binary);
00139             // Write out
00140             outfile << image_chunk->getAsString ();
00141             outfile.close ();
00142 
00143 
00144             //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory();
00145             RetablishDir (olddir);
00146         }
00147     }
00148     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00149     bool PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldBlendNeighbor::_load(const unsigned int mX, const unsigned int mZ)
00150     {
00151         const PagingLandScapeOptions *Options = mParent->getOptions();
00152         const String fileName = Options->LandScape_filename;
00153         const String ext      = Options->LandScape_extension;
00154         const String extModif = "modif." + ext;
00155 
00156         const String pageExtZ    = "." + StringConverter::toString(mZ) + ".";
00157         const String pageExtX    = StringConverter::toString(mX) + ".";
00158         const String pageExtZone = "." + StringConverter::toString(mZ + 1) + ".";
00159         const String pageExtXone = StringConverter::toString(mX + 1) + ".";
00160 
00161         // Load data
00162         const String strFileName   = fileName + pageExtZ    + pageExtX;
00163         const String strRightName  = fileName + pageExtZ    + pageExtXone;
00164         const String strBottomName = fileName + pageExtZone + pageExtX;
00165         const String strBRName     = fileName + pageExtZone + pageExtXone;
00166 
00167 
00168                 Image *tex = new Image();
00169                 Image *t_right = new Image();
00170                 Image *t_bottom = new Image();
00171                 Image *t_br = new Image();
00172 
00173         if (Options->Deformable && 
00174             ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(Options->groupName, strFileName + extModif))
00175         {    
00176         
00177             tex->load (strFileName + extModif,  Options->groupName); 
00178 
00179 
00180                         if (tex->getData() == 0)
00181             { 
00182                 LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(String("PLSM2 : Cannot find map named ") + strFileName + extModif, 
00183                     LML_CRITICAL,
00184                     true);
00185 
00186                                 delete tex;
00187                                 delete t_right;
00188                                 delete t_bottom;
00189                                 delete t_br;
00190 
00191                 return false;
00192             }
00193             if (ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(Options->groupName, strRightName + extModif))
00194                             t_right->load (strRightName + extModif,  Options->groupName); 
00195                         
00196             if (ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(Options->groupName, strBottomName + extModif))
00197                             t_bottom ->load (strBottomName + extModif,  Options->groupName); 
00198                         
00199             if (ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(Options->groupName, strBRName + extModif))
00200                             t_br->load (strBRName + extModif,  Options->groupName); 
00201                         
00202 
00203         }
00204         else
00205         {
00206                     tex->load (strFileName + ext,  Options->groupName); 
00207 
00208 
00209                         if (tex->getData() == 0)
00210             { 
00211                 LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(String("PLSM2 : Cannot find map named ") + strFileName + ext, 
00212                     LML_CRITICAL,
00213                     true);
00214 
00215                                 delete tex;
00216                                 delete t_right;
00217                                 delete t_bottom;
00218                                 delete t_br;
00219 
00220                 return false;
00221             }
00222             if (ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(Options->groupName, strRightName + extModif))
00223                             t_right->load (strRightName + ext,  Options->groupName); 
00224                         
00225             if (ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(Options->groupName, strBottomName + extModif))
00226                             t_bottom ->load (strBottomName + ext,  Options->groupName); 
00227                         
00228             if (ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(Options->groupName, strBRName + extModif))
00229                             t_br->load (strBRName + ext,  Options->groupName); 
00230         }
00231         //DataStreamPtr RawData;
00232         //RawData = ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().openResource(finalName, 
00233                     //mParent->getOptions()->groupName);
00234       
00235         // Validate size
00236         // Image size comes from setting (since RAW is not self-describing)
00237         // here 16 bits Raw file
00238         mXDimension = mSize;
00239         mZDimension = mXDimension;
00240                 mBpp = (unsigned int)PixelUtil::getNumElemBytes (tex->getFormat ());; 
00241         mMaxArrayPos = static_cast <unsigned int> (mSize * mSize);
00242         const size_t numBytes = mMaxArrayPos * mBpp;
00243 
00244         if (tex->getWidth() != tex->getHeight() ||
00245                         tex->getWidth() != mSize - 1)
00246         {
00247             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00248                 "Texture size (" + StringConverter::toString(static_cast<unsigned int> (tex->getSize())) + 
00249                 ") does not agree with configuration settings.", 
00250                 "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldBlendNeighbor::_load");
00251         } 
00252 
00253                 uchar *pSrc   = tex->getData();
00254                 uchar *pRight = t_right->getData();
00255                 uchar *pBottom = t_bottom->getData();
00256                 uchar *pBr = t_br->getData();
00257 
00258                 mMax = static_cast<unsigned int> (numBytes) + 1;
00259         mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];
00260         const double scale = (1.0 / 255) * Options->scale.y;
00261         mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00262 
00263                 unsigned int j = 0;
00264                 
00265 
00266                 for (unsigned int y = 0; y < tex->getHeight(); y++)
00267                 {
00268                         for (unsigned int x = 0; x < tex->getWidth(); x++)
00269                 {
00270                                 const uchar val = pSrc[ y * (mSize-1) + x];
00271 
00272                         const Real h = val * scale;
00273                                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00274                                 mHeightData[j++] = h;
00275                         }  
00276 
00277                         // grab the Right Column
00278                         if (t_right->getData() == 0)
00279                         {
00280                                 // Copy the pixel if we have no right border
00281                                 const uchar val = pSrc[ y * (mSize-1) + (mSize-2)];
00282                                 const Real h = val * scale;
00283                                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00284                                 mHeightData[j++] = h;
00285                         } 
00286             else
00287                         {
00288                                 // Copy the right border
00289                                 const uchar val = pRight[ y * (mSize-1)];
00290                                 const Real h = val * scale;
00291                                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00292                                 mHeightData[j++] = h;
00293                         }
00294                 }
00295                 // Generate the bottom row
00296                 for (unsigned int x = 0; x < tex->getWidth(); x++)
00297                 {
00298                         if (t_bottom->getData() == 0)
00299                         {
00300                                 const uchar val = pSrc[ (mSize-2) * (mSize-1) + x];
00301 
00302                         const Real h = val * scale;
00303                                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00304                                 mHeightData[j++] = h;
00305                         } else
00306                         {
00307                                 const uchar val = pBottom[  x];
00308 
00309                         const Real h = val * scale;
00310                                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00311                                 mHeightData[j++] = h;
00312                         }
00313                 }
00314                 // Corner Pixel
00315                 if (t_br->getData() == 0)
00316                 {
00317                         const uchar val = pSrc[ (mSize-2) * (mSize-1) + (mSize-2)];
00318 
00319                     const Real h = val * scale;
00320                         mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00321                         mHeightData[j++] = h;
00322                 } 
00323         else
00324                 {
00325                         const uchar val = pBr[0];
00326 
00327                         const Real h = val * scale;
00328                         mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00329                         mHeightData[j++] = h;
00330                 }
00331 
00332                 delete  tex;
00333                 delete  t_right;
00334                 delete  t_bottom;
00335                 delete  t_br;
00336     
00337         if (Options->vertex_shadowed)
00338         {
00339             mShadow = new Image();
00340             mShadow->load(fileName +  ".HS" + pageExtZ    + pageExtX + "png", 
00341                             Options->groupName);
00342                             //mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension);
00343         }
00344         return true;
00345     }

00347     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00348     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldBlendNeighbor::_load()
00349     {
00350         // Load data
00351         DataStreamPtr RawData = ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().openResource(mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename +
00352                     "." + 
00353                     mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension, 
00354                     mParent->getOptions()->groupName);
00355 
00356         // Validate size
00357         // Image size comes from setting (since RAW is not self-describing)
00358         // here 16 bits Raw file
00359 
00360         mXDimension = mParent->getOptions()->RawWidth;
00361         mZDimension = mParent->getOptions()->RawHeight;
00362 
00363         mBpp = 2;
00364         
00365         const size_t sourceHeight = mZDimension;
00366         const size_t sourceWidth = mXDimension;
00367 
00368         computePowerof2PlusOneSize ();       
00369                 mSize = mXDimension;
00370 
00371         if (RawData->size() != sourceHeight*sourceWidth*2)
00372         {
00373             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00374                 "RAW size (" + StringConverter::toString(static_cast<unsigned int> (RawData->size())) + 
00375                 ") does not agree with configuration settings.", 
00376                 "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldBlendNeighbor::_load");
00377         }
00378     
00379         mMaxArrayPos = static_cast <unsigned int> (mXDimension * mZDimension);
00380         const size_t numBytes = mMaxArrayPos * mBpp;
00381                 mMax = static_cast<unsigned int> (numBytes) + 1;
00382 
00383         mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];
00384         const double scale = (1.0f / 65535.0f) * mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00385         mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00386 
00387 
00388         MemoryDataStream dc(RawData, 
00389             true);
00390         const uchar *pSrc = dc.getPtr ();     
00391 
00392         const unsigned int shift_fill = static_cast <unsigned int> (mXDimension - sourceWidth);
00393         unsigned int dest_pos = 0;
00394         //for some reason water is 65035 in SRTM files...
00395         const bool srtm_water = mParent->getOptions()->SRTM_water;
00396         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sourceHeight; ++i)
00397         {
00398             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < sourceWidth; ++j)
00399             {
00400                 #if OGRE_ENDIAN == ENDIAN_BIG
00401                             ushort val = *pSrc++ <<8;
00402                             val += *pSrc++;
00403                 #else
00404                             ushort val = *pSrc++;
00405                             val += *pSrc++ <<8;
00406                 #endif
00407 
00408                 if (srtm_water && (val - 65035) > 0)
00409                     val = 0;
00410 
00411                 const Real h = val * scale;
00412                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00413                 mHeightData[dest_pos++] = h;
00414             }
00415             memset (&mHeightData[dest_pos], 0, shift_fill);
00416             dest_pos+= shift_fill; 
00417         }        
00418     }
00419     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00420     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldBlendNeighbor::_unload()
00421     {   
00422         delete mShadow;
00423         mShadow = 0;
00424     }
